body: @That Guy 319 Exactly. Even more...consider these events from Gin's point of view...confessing to her, getting to fuck her, only for her to run of with her sensei and pregnant. I doubt this is a good ending for her...hence it ending on a sad note with her realization that she fucked up by not trusting in him.

@pierrot so what you're telling me is that she cuts off contact with Gin and is now crying about how she wants to talk to him?... Looks like age didn't cure her stupidity huh?

Well anyway this series as a whole has been below average...the FMC was way too dumb for me to handle and the decisions in this story just don't make sense. 4.5/10.

They really need to fucking step their game up. Japanese people are into NTR kinks but it's getting fucking boring,the stories are predictable,the type of characters are usually the same with only a little bit of difference. Plots are fucking basic. If it's not the "Dense and retarded" route it's probably the "Slut MC Girl and Cuck MC Boy" route. I read these for the story but now it's getting boring. if i wanted to masturbate i'd rather do it to a picture of Donald Trump sucking his own dick. I know yuzuki is selling these because it's selling more,but geez man he's better when it's about incest or vanilla.

A solid 6/10 For bittersweet drama.

@pierrot that's a pretty dumb ending imo. well idk,i was expecting the ending to be something like -He stays with jin and raises the kid with him/ -Abortion / -Lies about the kid and tells him that it's his. Imo yuzuki could've done a better ending but this ending isn't that bad,Bittersweet. Bitter part is because she was a dumb cunt. Well it is hentai so you can't really bring up logic,it's up to the author to decide what happens. At least the teacher got arrested so i suppose that part is quite realistic. Lol.

About the epilogue:

- the teacher Kuroki has been arrested because he raped other girls
- Setsuna cut off contact with Gin and moved to the countryside with her mother then gave birth to a boy and now is bringing him up as a single mother
- Tomoe pays a visit to her then talking about when they were in HS and Setsuna reminds her childhood and the promises she failed she made between her and Gin and she starts crying.
- Setsuna tells Tomoe she wants to meet Gin and talk to him, Tomoe encourages her and said she loved Setsuna for a long time, Setsuna said me too, end.

@AngryNeckbeard It is his kid.  She left with the teacher but he got arrested for having done the nasty to other students in the past.  She ran away back to her hometown after that where she raised her kid with her mother.  Momoka and Ginta were looking for her and Momoka finally found her, hence this final chapter.
